projects.title: Hiroshima: Crucible of Light
projects.description:
A compact and yet complex piece centring around the destruction and human loss following the bombing of Hiroshima.

Samuel Pepys Theatre for SPS

projects.title: The Piper of Hamelin
projects.description:
From nothing to a fully cued show in a single day, I designed and operated the lighting under the supervision of Pat Krause for this children's opera, directed by the founder of the National Youth Music Theatre.

The Rose Theatre for Creative Youth/NYMT

projects.title: City of Angels
projects.description:
The most technically challenging show I'd ever worked on, with nearly 200 cues, 130 lanterns, and all the possible dimmer channels.

Samuel Pepys Theatre for SPS
